title: GOP Congressman Quotes Infamous Neo-Nazi In Attempt To Slam Dr. Fauci

sentence: Out of 429 voting members, three lawmakers -- all Republicans -- voted against affirming the resolution on Wednesday: Reps. Paul Gosar of Arizona, Thomas Massie of Kentucky and Matt Rosendale of Montana.
author: Calley Hair
title: U.S. House passes resolution declaring support for Ukraine

sentence: pic.twitter.com/UTZOeqPzkg — Alex Andrade (@RAlexAndradeFL) March 2, 2022 House votes on resolution in support of Ukraine, which includes a warning to that “it will never recognize or support any illegitimate Russian-controlled leader or government installed through the use of force.” GOP Reps Paul Gosar, Tom Massie & Matt Rosendale voted against it.

title: REPORT: House passes resolution backing Ukraine, 3 Republicans vote nay

sentence: Although the resolution passed by an overwhelming majority, three House Republicans voted against it: Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Thomas Massie (R-KY), and Matt Rosendale (R-MT).
author: Brad Reed
title: 'Unreal': Adam Kinzinger slams three GOP colleagues who voted against resolution supporting Ukrainian people

sentence: Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Matt Rosendale (R-MT), and Thomas Massie (R-KY) were the only three members to vote against a resolution that overwhelmingly passed the House of Representatives on Wednesday to condemn Russia over its military invasion of Ukraine.
author: Jackson Richman
title: Republicans Paul Gosar, Matt Rosendale, and Thomas Massie Are Sole Votes Against House Resolution Condemning Russia

sentence: The vote was 426 to three, as Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Thomas Massie (R-KY), and Matt Rosendale (R-MT) voted against the measure.

title: Three House Republicans Oppose Resolution Supporting Ukraine in 426-3 Vote

sentence: One of the three Republicans in question, Rep. Paul Gosar, delivered a clapback to Rep. Kinzinger that reiterated his America first stance.

sentence: https://t.co/0OXQ8wQVqo — Rep. Paul Gosar, DDS (@RepGosar) March 2, 2022 Rosendale has been silent, but in view of the Ukraine resolution’s lines about assisting refugees, it’s worth noting that he vocally opposed the resettlement of 75 Afghan refugees in Montana.

title: Three Republicans voted against supporting Ukraine, and it's surprisingly hard to guess which

sentence: The Republican’s proposal reads, “The 51 signatories of the letter who publicly and falsely decried Hunter Biden’s laptop to be Russian disinformation should be barred from holding any level of security clearances indefinitely.” Gaetz’s resolution is co-sponsored so far by fellow Republican Reps. Thomas Massie, Dan Bishop, Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar, Louie Gohmert, and Marjorie Taylor Greene.

title: Rep. Gaetz Introduces Resolution To Strip Security Clearances From Officials Who Called Hunter Biden Laptop Story ‘Russian Disinformation’

sentence: Many of those who opposed at least one of the bills were frequent far-right allies of former President Donald Trump, like Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Lauren Boebert (R-CO), Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA), and Madison Cawthorn (R-NC).

title: Republicans shredded for voting against Ukraine relief: They 'love Russia and hate America'
